```{r}
library(ramp.xds)
library(ramp.library)
library(ramp.work)
```

```{r}
sis <- readRDS("./models/sis.rds") 
```

```{r}
sis_seas1 <- xds_setup_eir(Xname = "SIS", season_par = makepar_F_sin(bottom=0.2)) 
```

```{r}
xds_scaling(sis_seas1, 25) -> sis_seas1
```

```{r}
require(viridis)
clrs = turbo(25)
```

```{r, fig.height=3.5, fig.width=5}
plot_eirpr(sis, grey(0.5))
lines_eirpr(sis_seas1, "darkblue")
add_eirpr_seasonal_profile(c(5,10,15,20), sis_seas1, clrs)  
```
